mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, product_line AS productLine, p_level AS priorityLevel, m_sla AS masterSla, s_sla AS sonSla FROM t_sla;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_sla( product_line, p_level, m_sla, s_sla ) VALUES ( #{productLine}, #{priorityLevel}, #{masterSla}, #{sonSla} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_sla SET product_line = #{productLine}, p_level = #{priorityLevel}, m_sla = #{masterSla}, s_sla = #{sonSla} WHERE id = #{id}
